#summary removeAllXXX(...)
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Dynamic shortcut method, replace `XXX` with the name of an association you have set up through [hasMany hasMany()].

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- a "hasMany" association from "post" to "comment" is required --->
<cfset aPost = model("post").findByKey(params.postId)>
<cfset removedSuccessfully = aPost.removeAllComments()>
}}}
